document_data.name: Shipwrights' House
document_data.location: [[Dock Street (Waterdeep)|Dock Street]] and [[Asteril's Way]], [[Waterdeep/Dock Ward|Dock Ward]], [[Waterdeep]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Shipwrights' House''' was the guildhall of the [[Guilds of Waterdeep|Waterdhavian guild]] known as the [[Order of Master Shipwrights]].
document_data.Location: This building was located at the corner of [[Dock Street (Waterdeep)|Dock Street]] and [[Asteril's Way]], in the [[Waterdeep/Dock Ward|Dock Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.Reputation: Like other guildhalls in the Dock Ward, Shipwrights' House was considered by locals to be a landmark.
document_data.Trivia: The [[Shipwrights' Ball]] was annually held here on the last [[tenday]] of [[Ches]], as part of the [[Fleetswake]] festival.
